column4: does anyone know how I can keep my nVIDIA driver from changing the resolution to 800x600 from 1024x768 (which was the resolution when the driver wasn't activated)?
my nVIDIA driver is a TNT2 M64 legacy card
and i thought i was the only one on such an old card!
yeah, it is an old card in a Dimension 4100 from 2000.  I upgraded everything else (1 GHz PIII, 512 MB RAM), but the graphics card, no
